title: Missions/Icons Bar Empty! MACOS 'Trying to reconnect'!
body:
Hey all,
I'm using the MACOS client, it goes to the 'trying to reconnect' screen every time I log in. Once I log in, the mission bars are empty so I'm not able to see what missions I have to do and my progress on it, and also I can't swap my icons because the icon bar is also empty when I click on it. Is anyone facing the same issue? 

NOTE: I tried reinstalling the program yesterday and everything was working fine, and now, it's back to the same old problem that has been occurring for days. 

Thanks in advance!

replies.body: It sounds like there's a network issue that's struggling to download assets.  Nothing is actually missing, it just can't load content properly.  Instead of a reinstall, your best bet would be the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help stabilize whatever is causing these hiccups.

But I can play without any issues, the ping is good and all that (usually sticks around 20ms) and Iâ€˜ve tried those steps several times and it doesn't seem to be sorting out the issue. You got any more ideas?

Your ping might show it's okay, but you might be experiencing packet loss.  You can run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to confirm!

If the guide didn't help, grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to collect some logs and attach it to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team will be able to dig deeper into this with you!  

The HRT also has an option to auto-configure your firewall settings in case you are being blocked from reaching us.
